title: Default sort by Arrival Date and increase MRN font size

requirements.summary: Set default sort order to Arrival Date (Oldest First) on Dashboard page while preserving manual sort control
acceptanceCriteria: Dashboard displays cases sorted by Arrival Date (Oldest First) on initial page load
Users can still manually change the sort order using the existing sort control
Manual sort selections persist during the session

file_operations.description: Update the default sortOption state initialization from 'arrivalDateDesc' to 'arrivalDateAsc' so cases are sorted by Arrival Date (Oldest First) when the Dashboard page loads. The existing CasesSortControl component and manual sort functionality remain unchanged.

requirements.summary: Set default sort order to Arrival Date (Oldest First) on Cases page while preserving manual sort control
acceptanceCriteria: Cases page displays cases sorted by Arrival Date (Oldest First) on initial page load
Users can still manually change the sort order using the existing sort control
Manual sort selections persist during the session

file_operations.description: Update the default sortOption state initialization from 'arrivalDateDesc' to 'arrivalDateAsc' so cases are sorted by Arrival Date (Oldest First) when the Cases page loads. The existing CasesSortControl component and manual sort functionality remain unchanged.

requirements.summary: Increase the font size of the MRN field in case cards on the Dashboard page
acceptanceCriteria: MRN text is visibly larger and more prominent in Dashboard case cards
Font size increase is consistent across all case cards
Visual hierarchy remains balanced with other case information

file_operations.description: Increase the MRN font size in the case card rendering by changing the text size class from 'text-sm' to 'text-lg' for the medicalRecordNumber display. Ensure the change applies to all case cards rendered in the grid.

requirements.summary: Increase the font size of the MRN field in case list items on the Cases page
acceptanceCriteria: MRN text is visibly larger and more prominent in Cases page list items
Font size increase matches the Dashboard implementation
Visual hierarchy remains balanced with other case information

file_operations.description: Increase the MRN font size in the CaseCard component by changing the text size class from 'text-sm' to 'text-lg' for the medicalRecordNumber display in the card header. This component is used by both Dashboard and Cases pages, ensuring consistency.
